about_the_game: You might think this game is a "lazy asset flip" but it's actually a hard working asset flip. (I worked very hard on it). It's a 3D platformer. But also you can shoot. And also there are bosses that you have to kill. And also there is wacky goofy dialog and very smart political commentary that says alot about are soceity. This game will change your life.

content_descriptors.notes: It's just an edgy game, we got politics and sexual innuendo up the wazoo dawg. You die a lot and that's treated lightly, and some of the characters admit to doing some heinous acts.

detailed_description: You might think this game is a "lazy asset flip" but it's actually a hard working asset flip. (I worked very hard on it). It's a 3D platformer. But also you can shoot. And also there are bosses that you have to kill. And also there is wacky goofy dialog and very smart political commentary that says alot about are soceity. This game will change your life.

short_description: A 3D PLATFORMER WITH JUMPING AND SHOOTING AND DODGING AND POLITICAL COMMENTARY AND FREE UNITY ASSETS AND BUILDING AND COLLECTING AND AWARDS AND ACHIEVEMENTS AND FUNNY DIALOGUE AND QUESTS AND YOU WILL HAVE A GOOD TIME I PROMISE YOU THIS IS GOING TO BE UNLIKE ANY GAME YOU'VE EVER PLAYED.
